text: All equipment, machinery, supplies, and materials of the Community Center and Playgrounds Department shall, on the effective date of this chapter, be transferred to the Board.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 8-226.

1973 Ed., § 8-219.

References in Text

The words "effective date of this chapter", appearing in this section, mean 30 days from the date of its approval.

Miscellaneous Notes

Recreation Board abolished: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 10- 201.

DC CODE § 10-226

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Parks, Public Buildings, Grounds, and Space. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Transfer of equipment, etc., of Community Center and Playgrounds Department.
